name: Castle Climber
description:
In this game, you are tasked with surviving as long as you can, trying to avoid being dragged back into the castle from which you recently escaped. Mystical platforms fall from the sky, and you must attempt to avoid contact with them for too long! Be cautious though, as the platforms will descend upon you fester every 30 seconds!

This was created for the Let's Create Game Jam, the theme of which was '30 Second Quest'. This was also my first released game.
